mods.abstract: Two color half sheet (red and black on green) announcing Charlie Daniels Band, Earl Scruggs Revue, Doc and Merle Watson, Vassar Clements, Ozark Mountain Daredevils and others at the Indian Springs '76 Music Festival on October 1, 2, and 3. Poster features metal photoplates of Earl Scruggs, Merle Watson, and Vassar Clements. To view the paperwork associated with this poster, see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/21030 and https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/21657.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
